title: 147: The Three-Star Soup Kitchen
itunes:title: 147: The Three-Star Soup Kitchen
itunes:subtitle: Italian chef Massimo Bottura feeds the world; ARFID is a new picky eating disorder; our recipe for ricotta cheesecake; and the New Yorker's Adam Gopnik on what the next generation is drinking. Originally aired 12/8-12/15, 2017.
description:
Italian chef Massimo Bottura feeds the world; ARFID is a new picky eating disorder; our recipe for ricotta cheesecake; and the New Yorker’s Adam Gopnik on what the next generation is drinking. Originally aired 12/8-12/15, 2017.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
